summary: A comprehensive test suite for the JoinMarket client library, providing unit and integration tests that exercise blockchain interaction, wallet creation and management, mixing protocols (coinjoin, Payjoin, SNICKER), cryptographic utilities (Argon2, PoDLE, commitment handling), transaction construction (PSBT, RBF), configuration, storage, scheduling, and RPC/WebSocket interfaces to verify correctness and security across diverse scenarios.
business_intent: Validate and safeguard the functionality of the JoinMarket Bitcoin mixing client, ensuring reliable wallet operations, protocol compliance, and resistance to regressions, thereby supporting secure and private Bitcoin transactions for endâ€‘users.
